alert.note: Alert for Jackson County; Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 7:04PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jackson County through 730 PM PDT... At 702 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Butte Falls, or 20 miles northeast of Medford, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 30 mph, lightning, brief, heavy rain, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shady Cove, Butte Falls, Lost Creek Lake, Casey State Park, Joseph Stewart State Park, Rogue Elk Park and Trail. This includes the following highways... Highway 62 in Oregon between mile markers 18 and 38. Highway 66 in Oregon Highway 70 in Oregon Interstate 5 in Oregon US 101 in Oregon MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson County; Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades
